name: Platformer Hell (Quantam Studios)
description:
Shoot and dash your way through enemies in a bullet hell turned platformer!

An updated version of a game made for Score Space #12 jam where it placed 9th overall. 

LEFT/RIGHT: A, D

JUMP: W

SHOOT:  LEFT MOUSE

DASH: HOLD RIGHT MOUSE + A OR D (Dashing provides invulnerability)
